sn35.138:1.2: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:1.4: The eye isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:1.5: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:1.8: mind isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:1.9: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:1.10: Suppose a person was to carry off the grass, sticks, branches, and leaves in this Jeta’s Grove, or burn them, or do what they want with them. Would you think:
sn35.138:1.11: ‘This person is carrying us off, burning us, or doing what they want with us?’”
sn35.138:1.14: Because that’s neither self nor belonging to self.”
sn35.138:1.15: “In the same way, the eye isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:1.16: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:1.19: mind isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:1.20: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.”
